query:
UPDATE abuse_detection_signals
               SET is_resolved = true,
                   resolved_at = NOW(),
                   resolved_by = $2,
                   resolution_notes = $3
               WHERE id = $1
               RETURNING id as "id!: Uuid",
                         user_id,
                         signal_type,
                         severity,
                         description,
                         metadata as "metadata!: JsonValue",
                         source_ip,
                         is_resolved,
                         resolved_at as "resolved_at: DateTime<Utc>",
                         resolved_by,
                         resolution_notes,
                         created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
